title: Battlestar Galactica BluRay DVD Extras x265
description:
Battlestar.Galactica.BluRay.DVD.Extras.x265

THIS TORRENT USES X265 HEVC (High Efficiency Video Coding) VIDEO
PLEASE USE A PLAYER THAT SUPPORTS X265 HEVC VIDEO LIKE VLC, POTPLAYER, ETC

27 MKV FILES WITH A TOTAL OF 82 EXTRAS
SEE THE NFO FOR FILENAME/CHAPTER DETAILS

THIS SHARE COLLECTS ALL BSG 2003-2009 BLU-RAY AND DVD EXTRAS
SOURCES WERE TAKEN DIRECTLY FROM BLURAY AND DVD
SUBS WERE INCLUDED WHEN THE SOURCE HAD THEM
NAMED CHAPTERS WERE CREATED FOR GROUPS OF EXTRAS FROM THE SAME DISC
ANY FRAMED EXTAS WERE CROPPED SO THEY REACH THE EDGE OF THE SCREEN

Battlestar Galactica BluRay DVD Extras x265: 8hour 42min 28sec 3,045,009,034bytes
Handbrake x64 0.10.3 20160122 x265 HEVC preset=medium
video: 19x 480p crf=19.00to21.50 (video ~408Kbps to ~694Kbps)
video: 4x 720p crf=19.00to22.50 (video ~814Kbps to ~882Kbps)
video: 4x 1080p crf=24.25to27.00 (video ~1804Kbps to ~2480Kbps)
audio: 25x 2-channel HE-AAC 96Kbps AND 2x 6-channel HE-AAC 224Kbps

This is an x265 HEVC video, HE-AAC audio encode of the Extras from the "silver box" US Blu-Ray box set and the Razor Bonus DVD from Best Buy for the new Battlestar Galactica (2003-2009). 

Features of this share include:

* Complete and consistent naming that includes the season#, disc#, file type, title, and a/v details.

* If the source had them, subtitles were included. 24x had 3subs (English, Spanish, French) and 1x has 1subs (English). These are the PGS subs (Picture based subs) from the discs which maintained the original subs' positions.

* Any framing of the extras, aka "black bars", were removed so the picture reached the top/bottom and/or left/right screen edges.

* 2x DVD extras that are TV specials are included in the TVSpecials share

* Season2 Disc5 includes a 2m27s extra of the "RnD Logos" that played at the end of BSG episodes. This extra was not included since a complete 4m50s fanedit with every RnD Logo skit is included in the Fanedits share.

480p encode notes:
* some 720x480 sources were 4:3 and some were 16:9
* some 720x480 had black framing bars so the source was really 360p
* "framed" sources were cropped so the encode would would reach the screen's edges
* due to the variable ARs and framing, the final encode resolutions vary
* all 720x480 sources were 480i and were encoded with deinterlace=slower

720p and 1080p encode notes:
* all 720p and 3x 1080i sources were 59.94 FPS and were encoded to 29.97 FPS
* 3x 1080 sources were 1080i and were encoded with deinterlace=slower

The file names are structured like this:
BSG.season[#]-[disc#].[source].[type#].[title].[resolution].[audio].[#-of-subs].x265

BSG: Battlestar Galactica (2003-2009)

season0-0: The Mini-Series "Night"
season4-0: The TV movie "Razor"
season5-0: The TV movie "The Plan"

brd-us: Blu-Ray from the US aka the "silver box"
dvd-bb: NTSC DVD exclusive Razor Bonus DVD from Best Buy

Please check out other releases of Battlestar Galactica, Gotham, MST3K, Rifftrax, DC Comics, documentaries, Star Trek Enterprise and more at:

and leave any corrections, criticism, comments and requests.

Thanks, bsg4you
